episodes.title: The Christmas Ban They Forced on Millions — Inside Armstrong’s Anti-Holiday Cult
episodes.description:
For decades, the Worldwide Church of God — led by Herbert W. Armstrong — forbade Christmas, birthdays, and traditional Christian celebrations, claiming they were “pagan,” “demonic,” and spiritually dangerous.
This documentary exposes the rise, dominance, and dramatic collapse of one of America’s most authoritarian religious movements, revealing how fear replaced joy, doctrine replaced Scripture, and submission replaced faith.

Discover how Armstrong built an empire on control, how families were torn apart by strict bans, and how the entire system finally collapsed when truth became impossible to suppress.

If you care about faith, culture, religious history, or spiritual manipulation, this investigation is essential.
